summary: A woman who is plagued by nightmares involving a serial killer learns her dreams have a horrifying connection to the real world.
cast: Patrick Fischler|Camilla Luddington|Amy Pietz|Caity Lotz|Scott Michael Foster|Nicki Micheaux|Haley Hudson|Mark Steger|Brad Grunberg|Trent Haaga|Alexandra Ryan|Leonel Claude|Suziey Block|Joshua Grote
director: Directors: Dallas Richard Hallam, Patrick Horvath
title: El pacto 2: El regreso de Judas
